typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as string,
		FL_DATE as string,
		OP_UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		OP_CARRIER_AIRLINE_ID as string,
		OP_CARRIER_FL_NUM as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		ORIGIN as string,
		ORIGIN_CITY_NAME as string,
		ORIGIN_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		DEST as string,
		DEST_CITY_NAME as string,
		DEST_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEP_DELAY as string,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as string,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as string,
		CARRIER_DELAY as string,
		WEATHER_DELAY as string,
		NAS_DELAY as string,
		SECURITY_DELAY as string,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FlightData
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ORIGIN_CITY_NAME),
	AvgDelay = avg(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY))) ~> AvgDelay
FlightData filter(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY) >0) ~> Filter1
AvgDelay sink(input(
		YEAR as string,
		FL_DATE as string,
		OP_UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		OP_CARRIER_AIRLINE_ID as string,
		OP_CARRIER_FL_NUM as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		ORIGIN as string,
		ORIGIN_CITY_NAME as string,
		ORIGIN_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		DEST as string,
		DEST_CITY_NAME as string,
		DEST_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEP_DELAY as string,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as string,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as string,
		CARRIER_DELAY as string,
		WEATHER_DELAY as string,
		NAS_DELAY as string,
		SECURITY_DELAY as string,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
